title: Rito what should I do if my launchers like this?
body:
Start the LoL launcher and black screen. What do I do?
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QzhwLcL.png[/img]

replies.body:
I had this same problem, I had to uninstall avg for this to work

this is the email i got from customer support 

"It looks like you're currently running AVG Antivirus. There is an issue where AVG is blocking certain files in League of Legends, which is why you're receiving that black screen. Could you attempt to uninstall AVG"
I can't find any repair button. I also use a windows 8. {{champion:64}} {{champion:64}}
The cog button in the top right, there should be a repair function in there.
I see. But the launcher isn't letting me click on it though. The only things I can click are the minimise button and the Close button.
This happened to me...so I waited an hour...and the orange button appeared
I tried fixing it from one of the youtube solutions. Did not work.
Please help any staff do please assist.
Have you tried turning it off then on again?

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5IRNunFQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-27T09:24:16.708+0000)
>
> Have you tried turning it off then on again?

Tried. Its still there. but thanks anyway.
